author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

For years, leftists demanded you wear face diapers to protect society from the invisible sniffles, since the virus was supposedly so deadly you wouldn’t even know if you had it. And while many on the other side pointed out that this also helps criminals hide their identities, the left slandered anyone who disagreed into oblivion.

This is what makes it completely disingenuous for Jerry Nadler to suggest that ICE shouldn’t wear face masks, especially considering he was on the opposite side of that argument until about five minutes ago. What’s even worse is
title: Jerry Nadler can barely see over microphone as he attacks ICE agents for wearing masks

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

While the majority of people reading this have had a very chill Pride month thus far, considering America made their voices heard in November, the same cannot be said for the Oregon House of Representatives.

On Wednesday, a drag performance took place on the floor of the Oregon House of Representatives after a resolution was passed to recognize and honor "Black Drag" history.

It's unclear what they mean by history, but it may or may not have something to do with "Herstory."

Happening now at the Democrat controlled Oregon House of Representatives.

Yes this is real…
title: Drag queen invited to honor Democrat resolution celebrating "black drag", performs on the floor of the House

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

One of the most infuriating things the left does is claim that it’s the other side that has been radicalized. And while sure, there are radicalized people on both the right and the left, believing in gender is certainly not what I would call “radical.” This is especially true when you realize that, until very recently, every single human being on Earth knew that men were men and women were women. So, it makes zero sense why Sir Stephen Fry, who narrated the Harry Potter series, is pretending as if J.K. Rowling is a “lost cause.”

According to Fry, Rowling "has been radicalized" and that it's possible "she has been radicalized by TERFs, but also by the vitriol that
title: Harry Potter actor lashes out at JK Rowling, claims she has been radicalized and is beyond help
